messages.body:
<tthankgod01@zwallet.com>

Dear Friend,

I know this mail might come to you as a suprise but take it verys serious and attend to it for this is a very confidential and beneficial business relationship between me and you.

I am the International Remittance Director of the Intercontinental Bank Plc cotonou in the capital city of cotonou de Benin republic.

On November 21st 2002,a Brazilian Oil consultant/contractor with the Benenoise Solid Minerals Corporation,Mr.Mauricio Jose De Matos made a numbered time (Fixed) Deposit for twelve calendar months, valued at US$8,000,000.00 (Eight Million Dollars only) in my branch.Upon maturity on November 20th 2003, as his Credit Officer, I sent a routine notification to his forwarding address but got no reply. After a month,I sent a reminder and finally I discovered that Mr.Mauricio Jose De Matos died on an Air Crash.Further investigations to trace his next of kin was fruitless.Again,I made further investigation and discovered that Mr.Matos did not declare any kin in all his official documents covering his Deposited fund worth of US$8,000,000.00 and as fund is still laying unclaimed in my Bank, no one can ever come forward to claim it due to the International Banking ethics,codes and Laws, and at the expiration of 2(Two) years being end of this year 2005,this fund will be revert to the ownership of the Benin Government if nobody applies to claim the fund.

I will like you as a foreigner to come freely to stand as the next of kin to Mr.Mauricio Jose De Matos no matter anywhere you are residencing.This is simple,I will like you to respond immediately on confirmation of your kind interest, with your full name s and address,confidential telephone and fax numbers for easy communication,a bank account in any part of the world that you will provide for the transfer of this fund to you as the beneficiary/next of kin.We shall need to prepare the necessary documents that will put you in place as the next of kin legally and officially just to avoid any eyebrow.After the successful transfer into your designated bank account, we are going to share it in the ratio of 70% for me,25% for you and 5% mapped out for any expenditure we might incure along the line while this business progresses.

For your information,this is risk-free tarnsaction in good faith and confidence.I guarantees you 100% of the successful execution of this transaction.I shall provide you with more details that will help

Thankgod Tobi

Dear Friend,

I am the International Remittance Director of the Intercontinental Bank Plc cotonou in the capital city of cotonou de Benin republic.

On November 21st 2002,a Brazilian Oil consultant/contractor with the Benenoise Solid Minerals Corporation,Mr.Mauricio Jose De Matos made a numbered time (Fixed) Deposit for twelve calendar months, valued at US$8,000,000.00 (Eight Million Dollars only) in my branch.Upon maturity on November 20th 2003, as his Credit Officer, I sent a routine notification to his forwarding address but got no reply. After a month,I sent a reminder and finally I discovered that Mr.Mauricio Jose De Matos died on an Air Crash.Further investigations to trace his next of kin was fruitless.Again,I made further investigation and discovered that Mr.Matos did not declare any kin in all his official documents covering his Deposited fund worth of US$8,000,000.00 and as fund is still laying unclaimed in my Bank, no one can ever come forward to claim it due to the International Banking ethics,codes and Laws, and at the expiration of 2(Two) years being end of this year 2005,this fund will be revert to the ownership of the Benin Government if nobody applies to claim the fund.

I will like you as a foreigner to come freely to stand as the next of kin to Mr.Mauricio Jose De Matos no matter anywhere you are residencing.This is simple,I will like you to respond immediately on confirmation of your kind interest, with your full name s and address,confidential telephone and fax numbers for easy communication,a bank account in any part of the world that you will provide for the transfer of this fund to you as the beneficiary/next of kin.We shall need to prepare the necessary documents that will put you in place as the next of kin legally and officially just to avoid any eyebrow.After the successful transfer into your designated bank account, we are going to share it in the ratio of 70% for me,25% for you and 5% mapped out for any expenditure we might incure along the line while this business progresses.

For your information,this is risk-free tarnsaction in good faith and confidence.I guarantees you 100% of the successful execution of this transaction.I shall provide you with more details that will help

messages.body:
Dear Sir,

I know you might be a good and kind man indeed and since you will receive this fund into your bank account, only let the bank account be your private bank account.Now do confirm your capabilty to handle this project with me in proving your sincerity and honesty because I would like this fund to save kept after your receipt in your private bank account by forwwarding as soon as possible your full address, telephone number's,bank information and your passport photograph.

Thanks and best regards Sir,

I am your's Faithfully,

Mr.Thankgod Tobi.
Tel:00229 99 70 93.

SIR, WHAT WILL MAKE ME TO START BLAMING SOMEONE THAT
I NEEDED HIS PRESENCE TO ASSIST ME IN RECEIVING A
HUGE FUND OF THIS AMOUNT WHICH IS MY OPPORTUNITY AS
A CIVIL SERVANT TODAY HERE IN AFRICA.

NOOOOOOOOO,I CANNOT BLAME YOU NEITHER I SAY THAT YOU
SCEPTIC.TELL ME THE SERIOUS SOLID DOCUMENTARY
EVIDENCE YOU WANT FROM ME, SINCE I AM OUT TO DO THIS
BUSINESS BECAUSE I HAVE BEEN CONVINCED WITH MY
SPIRIT THAT YOU ARE A GOOD MAN, I HOPE AM RIGHT
SIR?.

I AM AT YOUR SERVICE AND WILL LIKE TO TO ALSO
RESCIPROCATE ACCORDINGLY FOR I HOPEFULLY BELIEVED
THAT WITH YOU EVERYTHING WILL GO VERY SMOOTH.I WANT
YOUR INFORMATION'S FOR THE DOCUMENTS SIR.AM SERIOUS.

GOD BLESS YOU SIR.

THANKS AND BEST REGARDS,

MR.THANKGOD TOBI.

messages.body:
ATTENTION:MR.MIKHAIL STROGANOV.

MY RESPECT SIR,

YES, I HAVE REASONED WITH YOU AND WILL LIKE TO THANK
YOU SO MUCH FOR YOUR UNDERSTANDING AND STILL STAND
FIRM IN CONFIRMING TO YOU THAT I AM A SIMPLE HONEST
AND SINCERE MAN.

I AM PROMISING YOU THAT I SHALL BE SENDING TO YOU MY
IDENTIFICATION AND THE DOCUMENTATION REGARDING THIS
CLAIM BY MONDAY NEXT PRECISELY DURING LUNCH TIME (
BREAK-TIME ) AT YOUR STUDY, AND I STRONGLY ASSURING
YOU SIR THAT WHAT YOU MAY BE THINKING OF ME IS NOT
WHAT I AM SINCE YOU ARE ADDRESSING ME AS A BIZARRE
NATIVE MONKEY, OR NEITHER DO I COME TO DISGUISE ANY
UNTOWARD INTENTIONS.I AM HAPPY TO MEET A GREAT
PHILANTHROPIST LIKE YOU SIR AND WILL LIKE TO SEEK
NOTHING FROM YOU BUT ABSOLUTE SINCERITY AND HONESTY
AS WELL LIKE AM ASSURING TO OFFER TO YOU SINCE THIS
FUND IS MY OPPORTUNITY AND THE TRANSACTUION REMAIN
CONFIDENTIAL BETWEEN ME AND YOU TILL TO THE
SUCCESSFUL END OF THE TRANSFER IN TO YOUR BANK
ACCOUNT.

SIR, THERE IS NO RISK INVOLVED AND FOR GOD SAKE I AM
AN HONEST MAN TILL DATE EVEN IN PLACE OF WORK.THANKS
AGAIN FOR YOUR KIND ADVISE TO ME WHICH I HIGHLY
APPRECIATED TO MUCH BECAUSE YOU WORD'S TO ME IS A
LESSON SO THAT I WILL NOT ENTER INTO A WRONG HAND
AND TO AVOID EMAIL FROM A COMPLETE STRANGER
ADVISING. 

I WILL LIKE TO RECEIVE YOUR FULL ADDRESS FOR THE
CHANGE OF OWNERHSIP WHICH IS VERY RELEVANT SINCE YOU
WILL STAND AS THE NEXT OF TO CLAIM OU THIS FUND ON
MY BEHALF WITHOUT EYEBROW, TELEPHONE AND FAX
NUMBER'S RESPECTIVELY FOR EASY COMMUNICATION AND
YOUR BANK INFORMATION IN ADVANCE AFTER YOUR RECEIPT
OF THE REQUIRED CREDENTIALS FROM ME AND ONCE AGAIN
SIR, KINDLY CONTACT ME ON MY PRIVATE TELEPHONE LINE
00229 99 70 93 AS SOON AS YOU RECEIVE THIS MAIL AS
FROM 12:00 BREAK-TIME OR AFTER MY DAILY SERVICES AS
FROM 5:00PM TILL 11:00 PM NIGHT.

AWAITING FOR YOUR URGENT RESPONSE IN ADVANCE AND GOD
BLESS YOU!.

THANKS AND BEST REGARDS,

MR.THANKGOD TOBI
TEL:00229 99 70 93

ATTENTION:MR.MIKHAIL STROGANOV.

DEAR SIR,

I'M HIGHLY IN RECEIPT OF YOUR MAIL WHICH I HOPEFULLY
UNDERSTOOD ALL THE CONTENTS.

SIR, I WANT TO YOU BE REST ASSURED THAT THIS
TRANSACTION ARE REAL AND THAT THERE IS NOTHING LIKE
WHAT YOU ARE CALLING LOONY LEANINGS.I SHALL BE
SENDING TO YOU A COPY OF INTERNATIONAL PASSPORT
PHOTOGRAPH AND A COPY OF THE CERTIFICATE OF DEPOSIT
THAT CARRIES THE NAME OF LATE MR.MAURICIO JOSE DE
MATOS WHO IS THE ORIGINAL DEPOSITOR WHOM YOU ARE TO
STAND AS HIS NEXT OF KIN BEFORE FURTHER PROCESSMENT
FOR THE ONWARD TRANSFERFING OF THIS AFORE-MENTIONED
FUND INTO YOUR DESIGNATED BANK ACCOUNT THEREAFTER
AND SO THAT WE CAN MOVE AHEAD LIKE AS YOU ADVISED.I
WILL ALSO LIKE TO RECEIVE YOUR INTERNATIONAL PASPORT
PHOTOGRAPH FOR ME TO SIGHT THE FACE OF WHOM THAT I
AM GOING TO CONFIDE THIS FUND AT HIS CARE FOR
KEEPING, YOUR TELEPHONE/FAX NUMBER'S FOR EASY
COMMUNICATIONS, AND YOUR BANKING PARTICULAR'S WHERE
THIS FUND WILL BE REMITTED AFTER THE SUCCESSFUL
COMPLETION OF THE BANKING MODALITIES IN YOUR FAVOUR
AS THE NXET OF KIN.

KINDLY GIVE ME A CALL DURING MY LUNCH TIME BY 12:00
NOON OR AFTER MY DAILY SERVICES BY TOMORROW AS FROM
5:00PM AFRICA TIME ON MY PRIVATE TELEPHONE NUMBER:
00229 99 70 93 IMMEDIATELY AFTER YOU ACKNOWLEDGEMENT
OF MY PASSPORT AND THE DOCUMENT. 

HOPING IN ADVANCE FOR YOUR COOPERATION WHILE I
REMAIN KIND ATTENTION.

THANKS AND BEST REGARDS,

MR.THANKGOD TOBI.

messages.body:
DEAR SIR,

THANKS VERY MUCH FOR YOUR KIND MAIL.

SIR, I AM HAPPY FOR YOUR ACKNOWLEGDEMENT OF MY
INTERNATIONAL PASSPORT AND THE CERTIFICATE OF
DEPOSIT AT YOUR STUDY THIS MORNING.KINDLY SEND
ACROSS  ME YOUR CREDENTIALS SO THAT I CAN SEND YOU A
TEXTE LETTER WHICH YOU WILL RE-PRODUCE OFFICIAL AND
SEND DIRECTLY TO THE BANK MANAGEMENT TO START YOUR
CLAIM.PLEASE, THIS TRANSACTION REMAIN HIGHLY
CONFIDENTIAL AND WHAT I WANT FROM YOU IS TO RECEIVE
THIS FUND INTO YOUR BANK ACCOUNT AND KEEP IT SAFE.I
AM ASSURING YOU THAT AFTER THE COMPLETION OF THE
BANK MODALITIES INVOLVED BEFORE YOU CAN BE
ASCERTAINED AS THE NEXT OF KIN OVER THIS FUND,
WITHIN FEW DAY'S INTERVAL, THIS FUND WILL HIT YOUR
ACCOUNT.SIR, IF I MAY ASK, ARE YOU GOING TO OPEN A
NEW BANK ACCOUNT FOR THIS FUND OR ARE YOU GOING TO
USE YOUR PRIVATE BANK ACCOUNT?.

TRULLY, WHAT YOU SAID ABOUT TRYING TO REACH ME IS
THE TRUTH BECAUSE EVEN LOCAL CALLS HERE, THERE IS
MUCH PROBLEM.I APOLOGISY FOR THAT SINCE IT IS THE
ONLY COMPLAINTS THAT THE TELECOMMUNICATION COMPANY
WHERE I BOUGHT MY LINE IS RECEIVING FROM DIRECT
CUSTOMER'S.I PROMISE TO MAKE A CHANGE IN BUYING
ANOTHER TELEPHONE LINE FROM ANOTHER
TELECOMMUNICATION FIRM SO THAT WE CAN SPEAK WITH
EACOTHER SIR, IT IS VERY IMPORTANT.

SO, FOR YOUR EARLY INFORMATION SIR, I WILL LIKE TO
RECEIVE A GUARANTEE OF LETTER FROM YOU AFTER THE
COMPLETION'S OF THE DOCUMENTATION OF THE CHANGE OF
OWNERSHIP WITH YOUR NAME AND ADDRESS FOR THE
SECURITY OF THIS FUND AT YOUR CARE AND BEFORE THE
TRANSFER WILL TAKE EFFECT.YOU KNOW THAT AM A CIVIL
SERVANT AND THIS IS MY ONLY OPPORTUNITY AT THIS
PRESENT TIME.

HOPING TO HEAR FROM YOU AS SOON AS POSSIBLE.

THANKS,

MR.THANKGOD TOBI.

messages.body:
MY RESPECT SIR,

NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO, PLEASE DO NOT MISUNDERSTAND.

THERE IS TIME I SAID THAT YOU CANNOT BE TRUSTED BUT
I WANT YOU TO CONSIDER ME AS A POOR AFRICAN WITH
SUCH A GREAT OPPORTUNITY AND TO PROVE TO YOU THAT AM
SERIOUS SINCE YOU HAVE TAKEN YOUR EXTREMELY BUSY
SCHEDULE IN ASSISTING.I TRUSTED YOU TILL THE END OF
THIS BUSINESS AND REMAIN WITH TOTAL CONFIDENCE IN
YOU SIR, BUT THERE ARE SOME FEARFUL WORD'S THAT YOU
ARE GIVING TO ME BY SAING THAT IT SEEM THAT I THINK
THAT YOU ARE SIMILAR TO ONE OF MY GROTTY GANG_SOME
SORT OF FLY-BY-NIGHT FRAUDSTER.SIR, THERE IS NO TIME
I EXPECTED SUCH WORD'S FROM YOU.I WILL NOT HIDE MY
FEELING YOU HAVE DECIDED TO ASSIST ME IN RECEIVING
THIS FUND IN YOUR BANK ACCOUNT FOR ME SIR.PLEASE I
WILL LIKE TO BE RICH LIKE I MEAN AFTER THE END OF
THIS TRANSACTION.I LAUGH HAAAAAAAAAAA!.

I BELIEVED THAT YOU HAVE BEEN IN BUSINESS FOR 35
YEARS AND HAVE OFFICES ALL OVER THE WORLD, BUT TAKE
THAT I DON4T KNOW BEFORE AND NOW THAT I HAVE COME TO
KNOW IT, GOD BLESS YOU FOR YOUR INTERVENTION IN
HELPING ME OUT.

i LOVE SIR,KINDLY SEND ACROSS TO ME YOUR
TELEPHONE/FAX NUMBER'S,ADDRESS AND YOUR
INTERNATIONAL PASSPORT PHOTOGRAPH FOR MY STUDY.

I LOVE YOU AND BLESS WE ALL WHILE AM WAITING
PATIENTLY!.

THANKS AND BEST REGARDS,

YOUR'S FAITHFULLY,

MR.THANKGOD TOBI

REUIRED INFORMATIONS FOR THE PREPARATION OF THE
RELEVANT DOCUMENT'S THAT WILL ASCERTAIN YOU AS THE
NEXT OF KIN TO MR.MATOS OVER THIS FUND, FOR ONWARD
PROCESSMENT OF THE RELEASE OF THIS FUND TO YOUR BANK
ACCOUNT.AS A MATTER OF FACT, SINCE I HAVE TOLD YOU
THAT AM SERIOUS, I WILL LIKE TO PROVE MYSELF TO YOU
OVER THE RELEASE PROCEDURES OF THIS FUND TO YOU BY
SPEEDING UP THE MODALITIES.SEQUEL TO THIS,I HAVE
DECIDED TO CALL AT THE ATTENTION OF A LEGAL ADVISOR
BY INFORMING HIM OF MY LATE CLIENT'S BUSINESS
ASSOCIATE BASED IN MOSCOW WHO IS COMING FOR THE
CLAIM OF SOME FUND IN OUR ESTEEM BANK, AND THAT WHAT
YOU NEED HIM TO DO FOR YOU IS TO HANDLE THE LEGAL
PROCEDURES IN SEEING THIS FUND BEEN TRANSFERRED INTO
YOUR BANK ACCOUNT AND HE HAS SOLMNLY PROMISED TO DO
A PERFECT JOB FOR YOU BUT HE MADE IT TO ME TO
UNDERSTAND THAT BEFORE HE START HANDLING ANY JOB,
THAT HE WILL RECEIVE HIS CONSULTATION FEE OF $500,
AND THAT HE WILL PROCURE AN AFIDAVIT FROM THE BENIN
HIGH COURT WHICH WILL COST $250 ONLY.
SO, AS SOON AS HE RECEIVED HIS CONSULTATION CHARGES
ALONG WITH THE AFFIDAVIT FEE, HE WILL THEN START FOR
THE PROCUREMENT OF CERTIFICATE OF CHANGE OF FUND
OWNERSHIP AT THE INTERNAL MINISTRY.SIR, I AM HIGHLY
CONVINCIED THAT WITH YOUR KIND PRESENCE IN THIS
TRANSACTION,THE FUND WILL ARRIVE TO YOUR BANK
ACCOUNT AND EVERYTHING ABOUT THIS TRANACTION WILL
SURE GO ACCURATELY TILL TO THE END.I HOPE ALSO THAT

PHOTOGRAPH ( 4X4 )SIZE.

THANKS,

MR.TOBI.
